title: 神奇宝贝如何关闭技能回忆师等NPC的刷新
author: Tony馒头
txt_content:
RT
# Sets Trainer rarity. Higher values spawn Trainers more often. 0 spawns no Trainers.

I:"Trainer Rarity (percentage 0-200)"=0
复制代码不是培训师

replies.author: Tony馒头
replies.txt_content: 补充一下：1.12.2 神奇宝贝重酬

replies.author: 林琳
replies.txt_content: 我记得他 是不会自动刷新的吧？
